param.name: ppCert
param.para: Receives a pointer to a buffer allocated by the object. The buffer contains the client's certificate. The caller must release the buffer by calling .

param.name: pcbCert
param.para: Receives the size of the ppCert buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Passes the encrypted session key to the client.

param.name: pbEncryptedSessionKey
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that contains the encrypted session key. This parameter can be NULL.

param.name: cbSessionKey
param.para: Size of the pbEncryptedSessionKey buffer, in bytes.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Establishes a one-way secure channel between two objects.
